DOC.brief_summary: We would like to collaborate and further develop an ipad-based, interactive quiz game 'Emma'; to identify gaps in knowledge of inflammatory bowel disease in pediatric patients. These gaps can be used to improve patient education.
DOC.criteria: Children 1018 years of age Diagnosis of Crohn's disease or ulcerative colitis Englishspeaking Established patient of participating institution Exclusion criteria Inability to understand and read English at a grade 512 year level, as commensurate to their chronological age Research denial by patient or guardian
